characters.story: The state of mind bends down drooping since then - incensed with indignant resentment!
"Ping?" the flowers, water and water lily question curiously - is it duckweed, a floating plant?
"CHANGE!" the wild rice and water lily command sharply - use the scale for weighing, a balance!
"Yow?" the water questions curiously - to confuse, mix up the imp and monster!
"AYE!" the flowers command sharply - Chinese mugwort, an herb, wormwood!
"AI!" the mouth sings cheerfully - Good grief! An exclamation, alas!
"Bah?" the fingers question curiously - to pull out, extract, remove and yank!
"PAN!" the fingers and tree sing cheerfully - to climb, scale and ascend!
"Tune?" he questions curiously about where to stockpile, store and accumulate.
"DUN!" the head commands sharply - to pause, stop for a meal suddenly!
"DUN!" the mouth and pause command sharply - that's one ton, a weight measure!
"Churn?" the thread questions curiously - is it pure, unadulterated and genuine?
"JAY!" he commands sharply - the deadline to fall due, the session and term arrive!
The teeth bend down drooping to bite and pierce with molars.
"CHEW!" the teeth and sentence sing cheerfully - watch the shows, the performance and act!
"Ling?" the teeth question curiously about orders - what's the length of service, the age in years?
"SHYUNG!" the water sings cheerfully when bound up with sinister forces - turbulent, fierce and violent!
"Lee?" the bamboo questions curiously as it leaves - building a fence, a barrier and railing.
"GOO!" the sinner sings cheerfully despite the crime, guilt and offense.
The house and chili pepper bend down - time to butcher, slaughter and kill!
"BEN!" he commands sharply, trying to differentiate, distinguish and recognize.
"BEN!" she commands sharply about the thread - make a braid, a plait for the twisted beard!
"BEE!" the flesh commands sharply - the arm, limb and shoulder!
"PEE!" the hot sauce and dagger sing cheerfully - to split, chop and cleave the mountain!
"PEE!" the words command sharply - make an analogy, a comparison and metaphor!
"PEE!" the person commands sharply about the out-of-the-way, remote and secluded alley!
"EE!" the words command sharply - to translate, interpret and convert!
"Zeh?" the fingers question curiously - which to select, choose and pick?
"Zeh?" the water questions curiously - is this a swamp, a marsh with aroma?
"DEN!" the clench and soil command sharply - use a pad, a cushion of newspaper for the pockets!
"GEEZ!" the clenched hand commands sharply - being earnest and sincere about this best friend!
"JOE!" the thread and cornucopia sing cheerfully, tangling to twist in a dispute!
"Ling?" the ice questions curiously - will you bully, insult and violate?
"Ling?" the flowers and minute ricemen question curiously - is this water caltrop, an aquatic nut?
"Ling?" the pinnacle and minute ricemen question curiously - is this a mausoleum, a tomb on a hill?
"Kuh?" the mouth and acorn question curiously - did you just cough, hack and wheeze?
"SHAH!" the sheaf, resin and saber sing cheerfully - to brake, stop and halt!
The mouth and pigeon coop bend down drooping - to cry out, shout and yell!
"NYAHNG!" the whisky bottle and pigeon coop command sharply - to brew, ferment and distill!
"SAI!" the soil commands sharply - building a stronghold, fortress and barrier to block!
